Desc.entry: A not-for-profit community organisation to help make Broomhall a better place to live and work. Involved in regeneration of the area. Delivers services to youth in the area (aged 8-23 years). Helps people aged 18-30 years living in Broomhall with jobsearch, CVs, application forms, finding funding for training and providing support. Community learning co-ordinators help support residents into adult learning and facilitates and aids networking between local learning providers. Company limited by guarantee no 06398088.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9.30am-5.30pm (office times), monthly board meeting, please contact for details

category.entry: COMMUNITY FORUMS AND LOCAL ACTION GROUPS
